segments.text: It's so earlier this morning , Mr . Li ! You just came back yesterday , you should have rest much more .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to have rest , but I have many things to do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's very good , and the result isn't too bad .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . I will write a report about this post-trip , and then you'd better type it at the moment , OK ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ( Afternoon ) Miss Liu . Are you typing my report ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , what can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nothing . I just tell you take care of it when you type , especially the address and telephone number of those new guests . You should make sure that it's no mistaken .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , please don't worry about it . You should set your mind at rest .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ha , I know you are great secretary .
segments.speaker: S2
